sections.heading: of State; denial, suspension, or revocation of license; grounds
sections.text: The secretary may from time to time, upon first giving the applicant or licensee an opportunity for a hearing on the matter, (1) deny any application for a license, (2) refuse to renew any license, (3) suspend any license for a time or
